name: Pumpkin Picker
description:
This is my submission for the 2021 spooktober game jam. You can play this game either in the browser or on new grounds:     https://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/820300?updated=1635605349

In this game you have to plant, harvest, carve and sell pumpkins. You can also use fertiliser to speed up the growing progress although isn't as profitable. You can see the development over at:                             https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCj0DODJEHskP-QeiqUui1Ww
